articles.author: Barbara Starr, CNN Pentagon Correspondent
articles.title: Taliban members escorted Americans to gates at Kabul airport in secret arrangement with US - CNN
articles.description: The US military negotiated a secret arrangement with the Taliban that resulted in members of the militant group escorting clusters of Americans to the gates of the Kabul airport as they sought to escape Afghanistan, two defense officials told CNN.
